Model metrics¶

real_q_voter.metrics.calculate_mean_opinion(g: networkx.classes.graph.Graph)¶

Calculate mean opinion <s> of the nodes in graph

Parameters

g – nx.Graph

Returns

mean opinion: float

real_q_voter.metrics.calculate_weighted_mean_opinion(g: networkx.classes.graph.Graph)¶

Calculate weighted mean opinion <s * k> of the nodes in graph, where k is node’s degree

Parameters

g – nx.Graph

Returns

weighted mean opinion: float
